description: Journalist and historian Taylor Branch has written extensively about the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee and civil rights in his trilogy […]
contentencoded: Journalist and historian Taylor Branch has written extensively about the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee and civil rights in his trilogy of books that focus on Martin Luther King and his role in the movement. Branch won the Pulitzer prize for Parting the Waters: America in the King Years, 1954-63. Taylor Branch spoke at the 50th anniversary conference on the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee.
